committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development

official_title: To direct the Architect of the Capitol to sell the parcel of real property located at 501 First Street, S.E., in the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Architect of the Capitol (AOC) to sell at fair market value a specified parcel of Federal real property located at 501 First Street, S.E. in the District of Columbia under: (1) terms to ensure that a portion of such property will be used and maintained for child day care purposes; and (2) such additional terms as the AOC determines necessary to protect U.S. interests.

titles.title: To direct the Architect of the Capitol to sell the parcel of real property located at 501 First Street, S.E., in the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.
